DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine , whether 3RP feasible , accept efficacious durable deliver via Skype patient neurofibromatosis type 2 ( NF2 ) deaf severe hearing loss use Communication Access Realtime Translation ( CART ) and/or American Sign Language ( ASL ) . This substudy IRB-approved protocol # 2013P002605 . It study except look particular sub-population : patient NF2 hard hearing .
DOC.brief_title: Resiliency Training Patients With NF2 Via Videoconferencing With Skype
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Can read speak English 6th grade level 3 . Patients NF2 deaf severe hearing loss . 1 . Severe active untreated major mental illness would interfere study participation , determine discretion study investigator ( e.g . untreated psychosis suicidality ) 2 . Recent ( within past 3 month ) change antidepressant medication 3 . Use formal relaxation training ( include past participation mindbody program ) , currently past 6 month . 4 . Unable unwilling sign inform consent document 5 . Unable unwilling complete psychological assessment online via REDCap system . 6 . Unable unwilling participate intervention deliver via videoconferencing Skype . 7 . Unwilling use either CART ASL communication Skype group .
